meta.content: Serves students in grades K-12. Includes profile, calendars and events, school board directory, policies, enrollment information and links to the buildings.

div.p: We are so proud of the MHS Math Team for qualifying for this year's Midwest Regionals competition! Read more about the team's accomplishment here! https://bobcatheadlines.org/2020/04/28/marshalltown-high-school-math-team-%ef%bb%bfqualifies-for-midwest-regionals/

img.a: Read more about MHS Math Team qualifies for Midwest Regionals

div.p: Thank you to all MCSD administrative assistants, office managers, and administrative professionals! https://bobcatheadlines.org/2020/04/22/mcsd-celebrates-national-administrative-professionals-day/

img.a: Read more about MCSD celebrates National Administrative Professionals' Day

div.p:
Marshalltown Schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year in accordance with Gov. Kim Reynolds' order. Click here for more info.
El Distrito Escolar Comunitario de Marshalltown permanecerá cerrado por el resto del año escolar de acuerdo con la orden de la gobernadora Kim Reynolds. Haga clic aquí para obtener más información.. https://www.marshalltown.k12.ia.us/media/cms/School_year_closure_release_combo_8EEB605C2537F.pdf

In a kind gesture from the O'Brien Family McDonald's, whose franchises include the Marshalltown McDonald's, MCSD Transportation and Food Service employees were given dozens of fresh-made sandwiches; the gesture was to thank the hard-working staff for their continued efforts to feed Marshalltown children during the school closure. Read more here!https://bobcatheadlines.org/2020/04/17/local-mcdonalds-delivers-food-to-mcsd-food-service-transportation-staff-in-gesture-of-appreciation/

img.a: Read more about Local McDonald’s delivers food to MCSD Food Service, Transportation staff in gesture of appreciation

div.p: The MCSD Food Service and Transportation employees greatly appreciate this effort by the community to help keep them safe while they serve our students! Check out the full story here. https://bobcatheadlines.org/2020/04/13/community-donates-face-masks-for-mcsd-transportation-food-service-staff/

img.a: Read more about Community members donate face masks for MCSD Transportation, Food Service staff

Marshalltown is located in Central Iowa at the junction of Highways 30 and 14. The city has nearly 28,000 residents...
